title: New Order - 1987 - Substance [FLAC]
description:
Substance is a 1987 double album by New Order, grouping their best-known singles in their 12-inch versions, together with some songs that were previously unavailable. Some of the band&#039;s most well-known tracks ("Bizarre Love Triangle", "Blue Monday", "Confusion", "The Perfect Kiss", "Temptation", and the then newly-released "True Faith") appear in addition to various B-sides and two A-sides, "Procession" and "Murder".

Disc 1
01 Ceremony (12&#039; Version with Gillian Gilbert)
02 Everything&#039;s Gone Green (12&#039; Version)
03 Temptation (1987 Mix)
04 Blue Monday (12&#039; Version)
05 Confusion (1987 Mix)
06 Thieves Like Us (12&#039; Version)
07 Perfect Kiss (Substance Edit)
08 Subculture (John Robbie Remix Edit)
09 Shellshock (John Robbie Remix Edit)
10 State Of The Nation (12&#039; Version)
11 Bizarre Love Triangle (Shep Pettibone Remix)
12 True Faith

Disc 2
01 In a Lonely Place
02 Procession
03 Mesh
04 Hurt
05 The Beach
06 Confusion Instrumental
07 Lonesome Tonight
08 Murder
09 Thieves Like Us Instrumental
10 Kiss of Death
11 Shame of the Nation
12 1963
